name: Thief Robbery Simulator
description:
Become a professional thief. Make a perfect plan before the robbery. What's inside? Who lives there?
Find out when the house is empty and if it has nosy neighbors. Choose from lots of possible approaches to prepare the best plan. Many modern devices available in the game might come in handy with meeting intel about your target and it's neighborhood.

Rob houses within a limited time to earn maximum scores.

Main Features:
*Use multiple thief tools to unlock doors
*Multiple homes to rob
*Easy to use controls
*Laser & camera detectors to make levels more challenging
*Open-world city environment

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give us your feedback to help improve the game in future releases: support@socem.com.
